Waiting List for

Services by Need

Over 13,700 Pennsylvania individuals were on a waiting list for government assistance for services for their intellectual and developmental disabilities.

About one in five of their caregivers are age 60 or older.

Categories of need

Emergency: At-risk individuals who need services immediately

Critical: Support needed within the next two years

Planning: Support needed between two and five years from now

Caregiver

60 or older

13%

Emergency

36%

Critical

40%

Planning

24%

Caregiver

60 or older

5%

SOURCE: Temple University
